name: NSPDFImageRep
desc: An object that can render an image from a PDF format data stream.

items.name: init?(data: Data)
items.desc: Returns a representation of an image initialized with the specified PDF data.

items.name: var currentPage: Int
items.desc: The page currently displayed by the image representation.

items.name: var pageCount: Int
items.desc: The number of pages in the image representation.

items.name: var pdfRepresentation: Data
items.desc: The PDF representation of the representation’s image.
